generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wet asphalt road with visible lane markings and crosswalks, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and trees.
- building: A large, ornate stone building with arched doorways and windows is prominently visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green and autumnal leaves line both sides of the road.
- sky: A small portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy at the top center of the image.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible on the left sidewalk, near the traffic lights.
- car: Several cars are parked along the sides of the road, and one car is visible driving away in the distance.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at intersections on both sides of the road.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are mounted on poles along the road, including directional and regulatory signs.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, supporting traffic lights and traffic signs.
- terrain: Small patches of grass or terrain are visible along the sidewalks and at the edges of the road.
